channel.title: [PI] Teleporting exception FIXED!
channel.description: I was wondering how i could prevent a player from using the staff portal if their player rights aren't 1 or higher?

item.title: [PI] Teleporting exception FIXED!
item.dc:creator: @Basix Basix
item.description:
@Basix wrote:

It is unable to reach this statement

src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:58: error: unreachable statement c.getPA().startTeleport2(3165, 9629, 0); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

EDIT:

Fixed! forgot to add } else { after the return; statement

case 6282: if(c.playerRights < 1) { c.sendMessage("You must be a staff member to access this."); return; } else { c.getPA().startTeleport2(3165, 9629, 0); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the Staff Zone!"); } break;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Teleporting exception FIXED!
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Whenever the object is clicked, add an if statement before it handles it’s teleportation method.

Something like

if(c.playerRights < 1) return;

Read full topic
